settings.title: Need help? We’re here to save the day!

settings.question: What is Ludic Reserve?
settings.answer: Ludic Reserve offers a convenient way to secure your desired product even if your size is currently unavailable. By paying a reservation fee of Rs. 99/-, you can reserve your pair and get a first preference when it’s back in stock. Additionally, reserved customers receive a 5% discount on the listed price. This feature is available only for products guaranteed to be restocked soon, with estimated restock dates provided on the product detail pages.

settings.question: Is my reservation fee refundable?
settings.answer: No, the reservation fee is non-refundable. However, it will be fully adjusted against your purchase when you proceed to buy the reserved item.

settings.question: When can I make the purchase after reservation?
settings.answer: After your reserved product is back in stock, you will have a 3-day window to complete your purchase- from the restock date. If you do not make the purchase within this timeframe, the reservation fee and discount code will expire. Restock dates vary by product and can be found on their respective product detail pages.

settings.question: Why Ludic Reserve available only on few products?
settings.answer: Ludic Reserve is offered exclusively for products in their final production phase and expected to be restocked within 30 days. Since we focus on seasonal launches, we only restock products based on customer demand. If you’d like us to bring back a specific colorway or collection, feel free to write to us—we’ll do our best to restock them promptly.

settings.question: Can I make more than one reservation?
settings.answer: Yes, you can make multiple reservations. Each reservation will be charged separately, and you can reserve as many products as you like. Be sure to check the restock dates on the individual product detail pages for each item.

settings.question: Can I change the product after reserving it?
settings.answer: No, you cannot change the product after making a reservation. Each reservation is specific to the product selected at the time of payment.

settings.question: Can I make an exchange or return after receiving a reserved product?
settings.answer: Yes, you can request an exchange or return within 7 days of the delivery date. Please ensure that the product is unused and the return tag remains intact to qualify for a return or exchange.
